translations: 模特儿；人体模型（mannequin 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Even worse, it could also turn people into brainless, sunlight-averse monsters, leaving survivors no one to talk to but dogs and mannequins.
sentences.translation: 甚至更糟糕的话，它还会把人变成没有意识且怕光的怪物，而幸存者变得没人能交谈，只能和宠物狗及人偶说话。

sentences.sentence: THE mannequins were made of hollow translucent fiberglass.
sentences.translation: 这些人体模型是由中空半透明的玻璃纤维制成的。

sentences.sentence: Some of these mannequins "bleed" and have heart beats. Some even "breathe."
sentences.translation: 这些模型有些会流血，有心跳，有些甚至能“呼吸”。
